name: Panaeng Curry
ingredients: 1 1/2 cup – Chicken or Pork, cut small
4 tbsp – Panaeng or red curry paste
2 tbsp – Palm sugar or brown sugar
7 leaves – Kaffir Lime Leaves (fresh or dried)
instructions: Put oil in pan and heat until shimmering
Add curry paste, fry for 1-2 minutes
Add thick cream from coconut milk
Add meat, fry until outside is cooked
Add remaining coconut milk, simmer 3-5 minutes
Add sugar, fish sauce, and lime leaves
Just before serving add thai basil leaves

additional_context.source: Adapted from Alli's Thai cooking class
additional_context.story: When Isaac was 4, the family went to Thailand for several months. Alli took a cooking class and learned this recipe.
